definition: abbr. for Henan province 河南 in central China
happy/carefree/at one's ease/variant of 預|预[yu4]/old variant of 與|与[yu4]

sentences.english: His father did not hesitate to support and help him.
sentences.chinese: 李父毫不猶豫支持並扶持。

sentences.english: It was my neighbor’s wife! I rushed in without hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 原來是我鄰居的妻子在叫喚，我毫不猶豫的衝了過去。

sentences.english: We shouldn't boggle at this opportunity to make a profit.
sentences.chinese: 對這個賺錢的機會我們不應猶豫。

sentences.english: Between these four ways, a less sagacious man would have remained undecided.
sentences.chinese: 在這四條路中，不如他明智的人一定會猶豫不決。

sentences.english: I held back not knowing his real intention.
sentences.chinese: 我有點猶豫不定，不知道他的真正意圖是什麼。

sentences.english: Most viewers can empathize with the sense of hesitation and uncertainty embodied in such an image.
sentences.chinese: 大多數讀者都能感受到這幅畫中包含的猶豫和彷徨。

sentences.english: Otherwise, you will easily get lost or hesitate to go ahead.
sentences.chinese: 否則，你很容易就會迷失方向或者猶豫不前。
他的聲音猶豫不決，吞吞吐吐。

sentences.english: As if unsure of where he is, she hesitated and looked around.
sentences.chinese: 她彷彿茫然不知聲身在何處，猶豫地向四周打量。

sentences.english: But the more Tess thought of the step the more reluctant was she to take it.
sentences.chinese: 但是苔絲越是思考這個辦法，她越是猶豫起來。

sentences.english: Both sides still balk at his draft document's latest wording.
sentences.chinese: 雙方仍就他的文件初稿裏的最新措辭猶豫不決。

sentences.english: She hesitated, and then she smiled at him.
sentences.chinese: 她猶豫了一下，然後對着兒子笑了笑。

sentences.english: She hesitated whether she would take our advice.
sentences.chinese: 她對是否接受我們的勸告猶豫不定。

sentences.english: Fang's wife drank the poison with no hesitation. The poisoned turned out to be a cup of vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 房的老婆毫不猶豫地把毒酒喝了，其實那這是一杯醋。

sentences.english: As if unsure of where she was, she hesitated and looked around.
sentences.chinese: 她彷彿茫然不知身在何處，猶猶豫豫向四周看。

sentences.english: As if he were in pain or in some torment of irresolution.
sentences.chinese: 好像他很痛苦或者是處在某種猶豫不決的折磨中。

definition: to intertwine/to band together (with)/to link up (with)/twisted/tangled/confused/to be at a loss
to open one's mouth/to start to talk
to answer/to respond/to answer positively/to agree/to accept/to promise
helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]
(of a person) to turn round/to face about/(of a widow) to remarry (archaic)
to decide (to do something)/to resolve/decision/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]/certainly
